Uses of Class
oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1.ClusteredServer

  • Packages that use ClusteredServer 
    Package Description
    oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1
    Model classes that are part of the WebLogic Custom Resource extensions to the Kubernetes API.

    • Uses of ClusteredServer in oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1

      Methods in oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1 that return ClusteredServer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusteredServer ClusterParams.getServerDefaults()
      The default desired state of servers in the WebLogic cluster.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withClusteredServerStartPolicy(String clusteredServerStartPolicy)
      Whether this clustered server should be started.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withEnv(List<io.kubernetes.client.models.V1EnvVar> env)
      Environment variables to pass while starting this server.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withGracefulShutdownIgnoreSessions(Boolean gracefulShutdownIgnoreSessions)
      Whether to ignore pending HTTP sessions during inflight work handling when gracefully shutting down the server.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withGracefulShutdownTimeout(Integer gracefulShutdownTimeout)
      Number of seconds to wait before aborting inflight work and gracefully shutting down the server.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withGracefulShutdownWaitForSessions(Boolean gracefulShutdownWaitForSessions)
      Whether to wait for all HTTP sessions during inflight work handling when gracefully shutting down the server.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withImage(String image)
      The WebLogic Docker image.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withImagePullPolicy(String imagePullPolicy)
      The image pull policy for the WebLogic Docker image.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withImagePullSecrets(List<io.kubernetes.client.models.V1LocalObjectReference> imagePullSecrets)
      An optional list of references to secrets in the same namespace to use for pulling the WebLogic Docker image.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withNodePort(Integer nodePort)
      The port on each node on which this managed server will be exposed.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withRestartedLabel(String restartedLabel)
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withShutdownPolicy(String shutdownPolicy)
      Controls how the operator will stop this server.
      ClusteredServer ClusteredServer.withStartedServerState(String startedServerState)
      The state the server should be started in when the server needs to be started.
